<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Runner](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=359)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

You served as a messenger for a specific faction, guild, house, or individual, often running those messages on a short timeline. Finding the quickest path from point A to point B is your specialty and you've learned to make the most of your athleticism and navigational skill.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill for the city in which you were a messenger. You gain the [Quick Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=825) skill feat.
